item.title: Video editor - Upwork
item.description:
We have a roast of a founder, it's a song/rap.

You will receive the file (sound only) in MP3 format and need to make the video that goes with it. Can use public clips or the founder getting roasted + ask us what we need to provide if needed.

Video will be posted in short format max 60s vertical on reels, tiktok etc.

Please apply with a portfolio of previous work, share your top3 tiktoks/reels that are BUSINESS RELATED or have gone viral.

Please provide a quote per 1 minute reel/tiktok, we will have multiple reels comming in if the first gets good traction.

The first audio file is attached.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 08:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Belgium
click to apply

item.title: Voice Over Artist for YouTube Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented voice over artist to provide voice over for our YouTube videos. The ideal candidate should have a clear and engaging voice, excellent pronunciation, and the ability to capture the audience's attention. The videos will cover a wide range of topics, so versatility is key. As a voice over artist, you will be responsible for recording and editing the voice overs to ensure high-quality audio. This is a great opportunity for someone who is passionate about voice acting and wants to contribute to our growing YouTube channel.

Skills required:
- Excellent voice modulation
- Strong diction
- Ability to follow directions
- Familiarity with audio editing software
- Attention to detail

Budget: $35
Posted On: June 23, 2024 07:34 UTC
Category: Voice Talent
Skills:Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Audio Editing, Male, US English Dialect
Skills: Voice-Over, Voice Acting, Audio Editing, Male, US English Dialect
Country: NGA
click to apply

item.title: Creative Explainer Video Creator - Upwork
item.description:
Creative Explainer Video Creator Wanted!!!

PORTFOLIO IS A MUST!!!

We're searching for a creative and tech-savvy Explainer Video Creator to join our team. Your role will involve crafting engaging and informative videos that break down complex ideas into simple, easy-to-understand visuals and narratives. Ideal candidates will have a strong background in graphic design, animation, and video editing, with a knack for storytelling and a keen eye for detail. If you're passionate about turning information into captivating visual stories and have experience with video production tools, we'd love to see your work.

This project requires you to work with zoom screen sharing.  If you are not ok with working with zoom screen sharing, please do not apply.

Work Hours 11:30AM to 6:00PM PST (Los Angeles Time) Monday-Friday (Weekend Optional)

Hourly Range: $10.00
Posted On: June 23, 2024 07:27 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Production, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Skills: Video Production, Motion Graphics, Video Commercial, 2D Animation, Explainer Video, Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Animation
Country: United States
click to apply
